__u64 cn_round
 Used when a new scheduling round commences, in order to synchronize all clients with the new round number.
__u64 cn_sequence
 Determines the relevant ordering amongst request batches within a scheduling round.
__u16 cn_quantum
 Round Robin quantum; the maximum number of RPCs that each request batch for each client can have in a scheduling round.
